name: Getting Started at Djed Studios
body:
### Welcome to Djed Studios.

Get started installing all of your tools by opening your terminal and running:

```
$ curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/DjedStudios/getting-started/master/developer.sh | bash
```

Checkout your project's source and get to work!

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this? Contact Kate or Jeremy for help!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
